name: Casino Chaos (GMTK 2022)
description:
🛑🛑🛑

KNOWN BUG: TO RETURN TO THE LEVEL SELECT SCREEN AFTER BEATING A LEVEL, YOU MUST RELOAD THE PAGE 😅

KNOWN BUG: LEVEL 5 HAS NO ENEMIES 😳

🛑🛑🛑

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Click to shoot
  • Kill the cards!

Casino Chaos is a game made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. The published design can be described as a level-based shooter with the aim being to prevent the loss of money at a casino as much as you can! To do so, you will play as a dice with 6 sides, each corresponding to a different weapon. You can access a new weapon by interacting with the reroll icons around the map which will swap your current weapon for a random new one.  Your job will be to ward off the evils of gambling as they attempt to take your money.  Can you strike a balance between protecting yourself and conserving rerolls?

We had many other ideas that we did not have time to implement, including:

  • Melee weapons
  • a "+" item generated on the maps which would add a side to your dice. Enables a wider range of weapon reroll choices.
  • Unique mechanics for all the themed levels, including:
    • Billiards with rolling ball obstacles
    • Poker with a sectioned map with another element of randomness with what occurs in each section
    • Roulette with a spinning board and balls dropped on the map
  • Animations and on-hit effects for enemies, health bars for enemies

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Levels do not end when you complete them. You'll have to reload the page, sorry!
  • Some enemies' bullets fire in the wrong directions
  • Enemies are jittery and don't move properly
  • Enemies don't deal contact damage
  • Many weapons, enemies, and bullets are unbalanced; for example, some guns have extremely long reload times
  • Level 5 has no enemies at all
  • Levels 2, 3, and 4 are extremely difficult and drawn out

With this being our 2nd year participating in GMTK, we can say that this was a great experience with many, many improvements. We hope you will enjoy the game as much as we did making it!
